neurotools.spatial.spatialPSD module¶

neurotools.spatial.spatialPSD.psd2d(data, spacing=0.4)[source]¶

2D power spectral density accepts HxWx… data returns frequencies in 1/mm and power in uV^2

# test code data = randn(6,8) clf() cut = 1 subplot(221) f,x=psd2d(dctCutAA(data,cut)) scatter(f,x) xlim(0,cut*2) subplot(222) f,x=psd2d(dctCut(data,cut)) scatter(f,x) xlim(0,cut*2) subplot(223) imshow(getMaskAA(shape(data),3,0.4,cut),interpolation=’nearest’) subplot(224) imshow(getMask(shape(data),0.4,cut),interpolation=’nearest’)
